snippet: The Senate confirmation of a judge for a Federal District Court seat in Missouri is 15 years overdue.
abstract: Editorial asserts that Senate's confirmation of Ronnie White for seat on United States District Court for the Eastern District of Missouri corrects error committed when he was denied seat in 1999; faults Senate Republicans for failing to acknowledge their role in earlier smear campaign against White; says White's confirmation illustrates wisdom of rule changes instituted by Democrats in 2013 that ended filibusters against executive and judicial appointments.
lead_paragraph: The Senate confirmation of a judge for a Federal District Court seat in Missouri is 15 years overdue.

headline.main: At Long Last, Justice for Ronnie White
headline.print_headline: At Long Last, Justice for Ronnie White
